price: Esses são aqueles cujos corações e ouvido e vistas Allah selou. E esses são os desatentos.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ṭabaʿa al-lahu ʿalā qulūbihim wasamʿihim wa-abṣārihim wa-ulāika humu al-ghāfilūna
